mil5.2.7:1.2_1: na evaṁ hoti “ahaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāmī”ti vā,
mil5.2.7:1.3_0: Puna ca metteyyassa bhagavato sabhāvaguṇaṁ paridīpayamānena bhagavatā evaṁ bhaṇitaṁ—
mil5.2.7:1.4_1: seyyathāpi ahaṁ etarahi anekasataṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharāmī’ti.
mil5.2.7:1.6_1: na evaṁ hoti “ahaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāmī”ti vā,
mil5.2.7:1.6_3: tena hi anekasataṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharāmīti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.2.7:1.8_1: seyyathāpi ahaṁ etarahi anekasataṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharāmī’ti, tena hi ‘tathāgatassa kho, ānanda,
mil5.2.7:1.8_2: na evaṁ hoti “ahaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāmī”ti vā,
mil5.2.7:1.8_4: ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.2.7:2.1_1: na evaṁ hoti “ahaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāmī”ti vā,
mil5.2.7:2.2_0: Puna ca metteyyassāpi bhagavato sabhāvaguṇaṁ paridīpayamānena bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
mil5.2.7:2.3_1: seyyathāpi ahaṁ etarahi anekasataṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharāmī’ti.
mil5.2.7:2.4_0: Etasmiñca, mahārāja, pañhe eko attho sāvaseso, eko attho niravaseso.
mil5.2.7:2.6_0: Sammuti, mahārāja, esā ‘ahan’ti ‘mamā’ti, na paramattho eso, vigataṁ, mahārāja, tathāgatassa pemaṁ, vigato sineho,
mil5.2.7:2.6_1: ‘mayhan’tipi tathāgatassa gahaṇaṁ natthi, upādāya pana avassayo hoti.
mil5.2.7:3.1_1: pathavī bhūmaṭṭhānaṁ sattānaṁ patiṭṭhā hoti upassayaṁ, pathaviṭṭhā cete sattā,
mil5.2.7:3.2_1: tathāgato sabbasattānaṁ patiṭṭhā hoti upassayaṁ, tathāgataṭṭhā cete sattā,
mil5.2.7:3.3_1: mahatimahāmegho abhivassanto tiṇarukkhapasumanussānaṁ vuḍḍhiṁ deti santatiṁ anupāleti.
